section.heading: Bicyclists’ use of leading pedestrian intervals.

para.text: A bicyclist may cross at an intersection while following the pedestrian traffic control signal for the bicyclist’s direction of travel unless otherwise directed by traffic signs or traffic control devices.
A bicyclist may cross an intersection where a leading pedestrian interval is used.

annoGroup.heading: Effect of Amendments
annoGroup.annotation: The 2013 amendment by D.C. Law 20-49 added this section.
